roleplaying

Interface Gear

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Gear>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGear, FootGear, HandGear, HeadGear

    public interface Gear
extends java.lang.Comparable<Gear>
    This interface contains all the operations that all types of gears should support.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Gear combineGear(Gear newGear)
      This method is used to combine two gears of the same type.
      java.lang.String combineGearName(Gear secondGear)
      This method is used to combine the names of two gears to form a new name to the newly combined upgraded gear.
      int getClassOrder()
      This method is used to get the class order, which can be used for object sorting.
      HitPoint getEffectiveHP()
      This method is get the effective hit points of the gear object.
      java.lang.String getGearName()
      This method is used to get the name of the gear.
      GearType getGearType()
      This method is used to get the type of the gear.
      boolean isCombined()
      This method is used to check if a gear is a combined type or not.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Comparable

        compareTo

    • Method Detail

      • getEffectiveHP

        HitPoint getEffectiveHP()
        This method is get the effective hit points of the gear object.
        Returns:
        the effective hit points of the calling gear object

      • combineGear

        Gear combineGear(Gear newGear)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is used to combine two gears of the same type.
        Parameters:
        newGear - the gear that needs to be combined with the gear object that is calling
        Returns:
        the new combined gear
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when gears cannot be combined because they are of different types

      • getGearName

        java.lang.String getGearName()
        This method is used to get the name of the gear.
        Returns:
        the name of the gear

      • getGearType

        GearType getGearType()
        This method is used to get the type of the gear.
        Returns:
        the type of the gear

      • combineGearName

        java.lang.String combineGearName(Gear secondGear)
        This method is used to combine the names of two gears to form a new name to the newly combined upgraded gear.
        Parameters:
        secondGear - the gear whose name needs to be combined with that of the existing gear object that is calling
        Returns:
        the name of the new combined gear

      • isCombined

        boolean isCombined()
        This method is used to check if a gear is a combined type or not.
        Returns:
        the status of a gear whether it is combined or not

      • getClassOrder

        int getClassOrder()
        This method is used to get the class order, which can be used for object sorting.
        Returns:
        the order of class which will be used in sorting (preference in sorting objects)
